ygData.subject: Re: weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Exactly my order of preference as well.  I m lucky that at 18th I m dual wielding Thulian Claw and Dragoon Dirk.  The nice thing about this combo is that it
ygData.messageBody:
Exactly my order of preference as well. I'm lucky that at 18th I'm dual
wielding Thulian Claw and Dragoon Dirk. The nice thing about this combo is
that it keep both piercing and slashing maxed.

Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/



----- Original Message -----
From: Darrian Ashoka <dashoka@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 02, 1999 5:05 PM
Subject: [eqbards] weapons


> From: Darrian Ashoka <dashoka@...>
>
>
> personally i like three things in a weapon
>
> 1) speed
> 2) weight
> 3) damage/proc
>
> in that order of importance
>
> hence, right now what i'm using are the bladed thulian
> claw and the silvery war axe.
>
> i hope to dual-wield electrum bladed wakazashis by the
> time i hit 50.
>
>
>
>
> Darrian Ashoka
